title: Special Forces Malzahar
body:
I main Malzahar and a couple of my favorite skins have always been Special Forces Gangplank and Arctic Ops Varus, so I would love to see a Malzahar skin along the same vein. Here are my ideas on the skin:

* He's outfitted similarly to Special Forces Gangplank.
* Wears a jetpack that he hovers around with.
* **Voidlings(passive)** - are little robot drones that deploy with this skin.
* **Call of the Void(Q)** - is now 2 directional explosive devices similar to claymores.
* **Null Zone(W)** - can be a flame grenade effect or something. It's a bit hard since it just kind of appears without any animation from Malz.
* **Malefic Visions(E)** - can be some kind of weaponized chemical agent.
* **Nether Grasp(R)** - has him break out a large shoulder mounted laser(similar to the Spartan Laser from Halo) that blasts an enemy with such force that they can't move.

I wish I knew how to draw so I could provide pics, but I can't, lol. Anyway, there are obviously some details to work out, but I think a skin like this for Malzahar would please a great deal of Malzahar players like myself.
